Present location: INSTITUT DE PAPYROLOGIE ET D'ÉGYPTOLOGIE, UNIVERSITÉ DE LILLE III [02/049] LILLE
Name: Mummy mask
Description: Mummy mask with a yellow face and black eyes and eyebrows. The wig is blue. At the front, a crouched Osiris is depicted on the falling strands of hair of the wig. There is a headband with a solar disc on the forehead. A winged scarab was drawn on the top of the head. The back of the mask is badly damaged.
